meanings.definition: Relating to or based on the theory of functionalism.
meanings.sent1: The functionalistic approach to architecture focuses on how each element serves a purpose.
meanings.sent2: In the design world, a functionalistic style is appreciated for its emphasis on practicality.
meanings.sent3: The functionalistic interpretation of the fairy tale made the characters seem like problem-solving experts.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in a functionalistic manner, always seeking the most efficient solution.
meanings.sent5: The functionalistic concept of teamwork was illustrated through the seamless coordination of the group.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an emphasis on practicality and utility.
meanings.sent1: The functionalistic approach to problem-solving prioritizes efficiency above all else.
meanings.sent2: A functionalistic design ensures that every feature serves a useful purpose.
meanings.sent3: The functionalistic mindset of the inventor led to the creation of a revolutionary device.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe consisted of functionalistic clothing that was both stylish and practical.
meanings.sent5: The functionalistic nature of the tool made it indispensable in everyday tasks.
